title: [娱乐|机制]Advanced Electricity——高科技电力[1.10-1.12]
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1322621134 于 2018-5-13 13:20 编辑 
Advanced Electricity高科技      电力|介绍|粘液科技的附属插件,新增了6种东西作者准备添加的东西[=更新]Heat[这个暂时不知道是什么鬼东西,哪位大神指导回复]电力护身符便携式电池[上两个都是Thesocram的想法]新矿石[由liadw55提出]HeatElectric Talismans (Original idea by Thesocram)Portable batteries (Original idea by Thesocram)New ores (Original idea by liadw55)|附属物品|电磁脉冲 - 释放电磁能量Electromagnetic Pulse - A short burst of electromagnetic energy that will uncharge all players' Slimefun items.高级头盔 - 戴上可以获得夜视。Advanced Helmet - A helmet that gives you night vision.高级胸甲 - 可以减少电磁脉冲的伤害Advanced Chestplate - A chestplate that protects you from being affected by an EMP and reduces damage.翅膀 -可让玩家飞行，与鞘翅差不多Advanced Chestplate - A chestplate that protects you from being affected by an EMP and reduces damage.翅膀控制器 -附属翅膀的物品Archwing Controller - An item that enables the deployment of Archwings.爆炸铲 - 与爆炸镐差不多Explosive Shovel - Allows you to dig a good bit of blocks at once.源代码|前置|CS-CoreLib (最新)CS-CoreLib (latest version): https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/cs-corelib/files/Slimefun (最新)Slimefun (latest version): https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/slimefun/files/latest|指令|/AE-查看所有指令/ae
/AE version-查看先进电力版本/ae version
/AE reload-重新加载[权限 ae.reload]/ae reload|截图|
